Name: The Light Remake
About the game: There is only you, the abandoned remains of a former life and the flourishing nature that feels great in the absence of man. This world is both gloomy and empty, but so incredibly beautiful. The Light is a remake of the original 2012 game, an atmospheric author’s parable about our place in this world, life and death. Explore a mysterious territory filled with a variety of details that reveal the story. Solve logic puzzles and explore text messages. FEATURES Meditation first-person quest Beautiful visual and melodic compositions from Dmitry Nikolaev - the author of OST to the game '35MM'. A metaphorical philosophical story revealed in a study of details and surroundings. Two endings.
